title: My Idea for Ceria
excerpt: How I decided to build out one application for everything I need.
markdown:
### Intro:
---
I had this *brilliant* idea for an application that handles all of my life for me


It should be able to:
- Have different *spaces* for all of my needs
- Each space should contain tasks for me
- Each space can be like a separate learning zone, with spaced repetition learning activities
- I could also have a space for a project, which should let me store passwords and break down tasks

### Core feature:
---
A big thing for me is balancing my physical journal with digital task apps. I decided that ceria will incorporate both into one system. At the end of each day, I can create a *specialized journal prompt* to internalize everything I've learned/accomplished that day.

### Agent:
---
This application will have an AI agent that works through all of your spaces, inspired by Arc browser or spotlight search. A floating bar will allow you to interface with everything, everywhere.

### Tutoring:
---
As a long-time educator, I really want to embed features that help me with that work as well. Each space will allow users to add mentors/instructors, who will be able to access your own guided learning plan. They can assign specific activities, view your progress, and deliver directed lessons.
